snippet: The British financier Nathaniel Rothschild said he regretted having partnered with the Bakrie family, an Indonesian dynastic family who helped him build the London-listed mining company Bumi.
abstract: The British financier Nathaniel Rothschild said he regretted having partnered with the Bakrie family, an Indonesian dynastic family who helped him build the London-listed mining company Bumi.

headline.main: Rothschild Resigns from Board of Mining Company
